base.title: {{bot_username}} | Help
base.description:
**About {{bot_username}}:**
> We have a lot of plans for **{{bot_username}}**. These include a variety of modules, such as automatic quotes, channel statistics, welcome & goodbye system, and many more exciting features!

**Usage:**
> To use commands on the bot, you can utilize our slash commands. You can find these listed under the commands section within the help command.

**Statistics:**
> Servers: `{{serverCount}}`
> Users: `{{userCount}}`
